entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 3:32 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: ESE 61 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to drizzle this evening and ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
